name: Star Trek™: Bridge Crew
description: Star Trek™: Bridge Crew, playable in both VR and non-VR, will immerse you in the Star Trek universe. In co-op, form a crew of four players to serve in the roles of Captain, Helm, Tactical or Engineer. Make strategic decisions and coordinate actions with your crew.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 x64 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, AMD Radeon RX 570 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space Additional Notes: Resolution: 2160 x 1200 @90Hz; Video Preset: Msaa 2x, all video options ON; VSync:Off
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions only) Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 1500X Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / GTX 1060 6GB,  AMD Radeon R9 290X / RX 480 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space Additional Notes: Resolution: 2160 x 1200 @90Hz; Video Preset: Msaa 2x, all video options ON; VSync:Off
